article_title: Israel says Hamas leader killed on third day of West Bank operation
sentence: The  Israeli  military  says  it  has  killed  the  head  of  the  Palestinian  armed  group  Hamas  in  Jenin  and  two  other  fighters,  as  a  major  operation  continues  for  a  third  day  in  the  north  of  the  occupied  West  Bank.
